typeSystemDescription.name: LuminarAIDetection
typeSystemDescription.description: The Types for annotating AI-generated content using the Luminar AI detector model.

typeDescription.name: org.texttechnologylab.annotation.luminar.AIDetection
typeDescription.description: A typesystem for the Luminar AI detector, providing probabilities that a given document is AI-generated or not. Depending on the model, this is done on document-level only or on sequence- and document-level.

featureDescription.name: detectionScore
featureDescription.description: Ranging from 0 to 1, where near 0 means likely human and near 1 means likely AI.

featureDescription.name: level
featureDescription.description: The level on which this detection was applied, e.g. SEQUENCE or DOCUMENT level.

featureDescription.name: model
featureDescription.description: The model version used for this detection annotation.
